column5: Location! Location! Location! Private 2 Bedroom Apartment with Pool, Hot Tub/Spa, Gym, within walking distance to the Beach, Walmart, Specs, Randalls, Sonic, Taco Cabana and many other restaurants. Within minutes from Convention Center, San Luis Resort, Rain Forest cafe. Less than 3 miles to Moody Gardens & Schlitterbahn Waterpark, also Pleasure Pier. Why pay more when you can stay here?
column8: MAR-y-SOL GOOD VIBES, Resort Style Apartment
